channel.title: How do i change background
channel.description: Hey guys.. i really want my own server client.. i try editing other server's clients but they change the background to what ever their server was... please help me how to edit that or make that... Like to Put Tony-Scape or something please help me!!

item.title: How do i change background
item.dc:creator: @kpop kpop
item.description:
@kpop wrote:

if u have 317 go to the sprites folder and look for the picture of the current background, right click it and edit it with paint or w/e image software you want to use, adobe photoshop works great, then save and compile. if ur in 508 u’ll need a cache extractor and thats about all i know so far

Read full topic
